subject: Steroids
Baseball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The indictments of the Black Sox, in the long run, were good for baseball. The indictment (and the possible conviction) of Barry Bonds, in the long run, will be good for baseball.
snippet: The indictments of the Black Sox, in the long run, were good for baseball. The indictment (and the possible conviction) of Barry Bonds, in the long run, will be good for baseball.
